func.title: SetPosition

param.name: x
param.desc: New X position of the object.

param.name: y
param.desc: New Y position of the object.

param.name: check_bounds
param.desc: Only applies to objects using the BorderBound property. Ensures that the position is always within the limits specified by the object.

param.name: prec
param.desc: Precision. Coordinates are divided by this value to enable movement to fractional positions. Defaults to 1.

func.desc: Moves the object to the specified position. This will set the exact pixel position and any internal sub-pixel offsets will be reset.
